column5: And lemme guess....it wasn't caused by a fish?
I SWEAR I AM JUST SAT HERE LMDAO!!!!
Ok...you gotta post a report now....LOL
You might be able to repair it?  Mike
lol, report posted  Oh yeah, I did repair the rod. It's still 6 inches shorter though! haha
Just think of it as a little less awkward, still makes a goog lightning rod.

Rich ur useless......Okay sorry never replied last night was late was tired and had to be up at 6.00am and just got home from work.  Well last night around 7.30 decided i wanted to go fishing so rich came with me.  Took my dog princess......She was in the back of the van picked up rich he put his rods in the back and as we were driving princess i guess decided she would lay where one of riches rod ends ....lol......Anyway we got there he fixed up his line i grabbed a rod......Could not see a blooming thing.......WAS FISHING THEN I SEE RICH YANKING AT HIS ROD AND FOR Second thought he had a fish...As it happened he had a tree....lmao so he lost everything....I was casting and could not see where the heck my line was going...Anyway i am thinking hummm summit does not feel right , Remember it was pitch black....lol......Shine a light on the end of the rod and everything is all twisted up so we gave it up.....lol......But what the heck atleast i got out for an hr....When ur stuck working all day inside who cares if its dark and cold when u go out fishing...Its just nice to be beside the water and get some fresh air and be able to drop a line in the water.....Day off tommorow  Anyone wanna go fishing?
I made a report Nauti... i think your eyes are useless.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=1109

lmao....I know rich i just found it,,,My eyes are perfectly fine....Some of us work more than a measley four hrs a day   Been a very very very long day and i am like totally knackered thankgawd i am off for three day's now.....Whooo.hoooooooooooooooo   Wanna go fishing in the dark again?......lol
I think that April is actually the worst month for fishing, unless your into carp or have a Great Lakes boat for spring salmon. Yup, musky closes province wide Dec. 15th.  cheers,  ehg

I've never seen so little fishing reports, in the few years i've seen this board, as there is on this first page today. Must be the weather this weekend and the closing of fishing on most lakes around the province. Not to worry though there is more BOQ to go and once ice is on Simcoe there will be many, many perch reports  cheers,  ehg
I'm workin' on it!  Trying for more quality and not quantity. I've been catching fish, just not happy with the sizes......
And I'm just working on catching a fish
Blyght and I are working on a season ending report....be sure to look out for it soon!!! Been too busy with Christmas to get to posting it.  You wont regret reading it.....haha
Yup the weather has for sure played a big factor in the lesser amounts of fishing reports but i doubt it will be for long......  &^ did i hear someone say PERCH?  MMMMmmm
I think this is typical of December?  Lots of people have put their boats away, Kawarthas closed, only some never-say-quit anglers still out...  Mike
Yeah...reports are hard to come by now.  If someone hooked a minnow on the end of a hook and posted the pic, I'd probably get all excited!!!!
Here ya go ccm...    LOL Tony
baby
i don't even remember the last time i went fishing, let alone posted a report
Ahhh December the mods worst month of the year... not much fishing and alot of hockey.. throw in the xmas depression and....
I was at a boat launch today....does that count?
Awesome report!!!!! But jeez....no pics of the launch???
2 WEEKS NOW AND I AINT BEEN OUT!!! ITS KILLIN ME HERE!!! WORK 1 WEEKEND AND BILLS GAME LAST WEEKEND(RATHER OF WENT FISHING THOUGH  LOL)  HOPIN TO SNEAK OUT THIS WEEK!!!
I got a small 2 pound bow today in 4" visibility but cplummer has the pic....wasn't really worth posting I think
I took Monday and Tuesday off work, so look for my report on Wednesday!
Lots a chrome on the way ... then a week of getting REALLY FAT .. then .... HARDWATER .... woo hooo
Last weekend was truly a tough time to get out to what little areas are still open. For sure more steelhead and BOQ reports to go, then the ice  ehg

Heading out to the upper this weekend for the last weekend of muskie fishing  Tough bite but it is still nice to get out there. After this weekend I will start fishing the lower queenston short and long drifts through the winter and head to the niagara bar, when wind permits, for lakers.
december and April, the two worst months for me

wELL I HAVE A FISHING REPORT   Me and rich went out and fished for all of 50 minutes tonight...We dropped our lines in the water   and well lets say it ended up being one disaster onto another disaster....lol
After what you've been thru lately nautifish, nothing surprises me.  I just hope your boat isn't at the bottom of the lake....
lmao nope no boat involved thank goodness....But i reckon rich is wishing he had just stayed home now......lmao
There ought to be a report about the report...    Mike
My beautiful 13 foot noodle rod has now become a not so beautiful 12'6
